description: Try our easy to follow Snapper with Red Grapefruit & Almond Salsa recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Snapper with Red Grapefruit & Almond Salsa Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 475g Woolworths classic potato mash, warmed (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Lightly dust fish with flour. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large fry pan. Add fish, 2 at a time and cook on both sides until flesh just flakes when tested with a fork. Remove from pan and keep warm. Repeat with remaining fish.
Heat remaining oil in fry pan. Add almonds and cook until golden. Add parsley, grapefruit juice, grapefruit segments and season with pepper. Heat gently.
Serve fish on warmed plates with mashed potatoes and steamed silver beet. Spoon redfleshed grapefruit and almond salsa over fish. Serve immediately.
